DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct compare safety efficacy 2 dos avanafil placebo diabetic men mild severe erectile dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: Research Evaluating Investigational Medication Erectile Dysfunction - Diabetic ED ( REVIVE-D )
DOC.criteria: Male subject , age â‰¥ 18 year ; Minimum 6 month history mild severe erectile dysfunction ; Have document diabetes ( type 1 type 2 ) ; Subject monogamous , heterosexual relationship least 3 month ; Subject agree make least 4 attempt intercourse per month ; Subject willing able provide inform consent .
